page.title: 11EVENTS IN FARLEY
page.content: One of the events in the village is the fete. It is held in the playing fields. There is always a fete queen and two attendants. Some of the stalls are the bottle stall, the raffle stall and more. There are competitions at the fete and some are fancy dress, cakes, painting, drawing and more. Some adult competitions are flower arrangment, knitted articles, painting, photography and others. There are quite a few side shows such as bran tub, darts, hoop-la, coconut shy, skittles and lots more. The local pub, The Hook and Glove, organises several events. One of these is a skittles evening when you can win prizes. In June 1985 there was a week long Festival. Every evening there was some musical entertainment in the church. There was a Barn Dance on the Friday.
